应用: 应用内菜单导航布局更新: APP: update the navigation inside APP
应用: 表单统一修改成上下布局: APP: form is uniformly modified to a vertical layout
画布: 画布ui重构、物料区、菜单栏、配置区更新: Canvas: canvas ui refactoring, material area, menu bar, configuration area update
画布: v-model支持表达式: Canvas: v-model input support enter expression
数据源: 数据源内置接口支持自定义字段: Data source: data source built-in interface supports custom field
流程&表单: 表单字段数据源支持数据表、API数据源: Flow & form: form field data sources support data tables and API data sources
应用: 国际化相关样式优化、问题修复: APP: internationalization-related style optimization and bug fixes
画布: 进入画布时，数据未更新问题: Canvas: the data is not updated when entering the canvas page
画布: 修复复制拥有相同type类型组件时，数据异常问题: Canvas: fix the problem of abnormal data when copying components with the same type
画布: 修复自由布局的粘贴位置问题: Canvas: fix the paste position problem of free layout
画布: 修复移动端漂浮栏滚动位置错误问题: Canvas: fix the problem that the scrolling position of the floating bar on the mobile terminal is wrong
流程&表单: 流程相关问题修复: Flow & form: fix related bug of flow
